title: Tend - Coming Soon!

hero.title: Join the waitlist. Win a tub of money.
hero.body: We believe that everyday banking, finding great deals, and maximizing your money doesn’t have to be so complicated. And that everyone deserves a fair shot at striking it rich. We’ll send you an invitation to join Tend when we launch, and we’ll enter you for a chance to win a bathtub full of money. For swimming, saving, or spending—your money, your call.

error.label: error
error.unspecific: Something went wrong, please try again later.

ready_to_join.headline: Ready to join?
ready_to_join.body: Managing your money shouldn’t come with hidden fees, lousy service or stress headaches. Let’s feng shui your banking experience—for $9.95/month.

sticky_footer.disclaimer: Tend is a financial technology company, not a bank. Banking services provided by nbkc bank, Member FDIC. International transfer banking services are provided by CFSB, Member FDIC.

disclosures.dive_bar: ^ The Tend debit card can be used for free at over 37,000 ATMs in the MoneyPass Network.  Tend does not charge ATM fees, but some ATM providers may charge fees of their own, which are not reimbursed.
disclosures.cashback: ^^ Cashback deals on Tend purchases, including categories, merchants, and percentages, will vary and must be selected in the app. Cashback will be applied automatically after the travel dates or final transaction posts, which may be up to 90 days after the qualifying purchase or travel event.
